tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_purchase_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    customer_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id) NOT NULL,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_behavior TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerDetails (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE ProductDetails (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE PredictiveAnalytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_purchase_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity INT
);
